tool_description: API implementation for programatically interacting with blur.io marketplace.
name: Blur.io API
title: Blur.io API

api_list.name: Get Collections
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://blur-io-api.p.rapidapi.com/blur/getCollections"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "blur-io-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Generate Calldata
api_list.description: Generate the call data required to submit an on-chain transaction to purchase an NFT on blur.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://blur-io-api.p.rapidapi.com/blur/getCalldata"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "blur-io-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get User Placed Collection Bids
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to get the collection bids placed by any wallet, requires a valid authentication token for the wallet you'd like to query.

        }

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Challenge Message
api_list.description: Most requests to blur require the wallets signed authentication token, use this endpoint to retrieve the required information to sign on the users wallet.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://blur-io-api.p.rapidapi.com/blur/getChallenge"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "blur-io-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Collection Bid Message To Sign
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to retrieve the marketplace message required to sign with a wallet. Required for placing a collection bid.

url = "https://blur-io-api.p.rapidapi.com/blur/getCollectionBidMessageToSign"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "blur-io-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Authentication Token
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to retrieve the users authentication token, required for most blur requests.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://blur-io-api.p.rapidapi.com/blur/login"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "blur-io-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
